website_summaries.verdict: With its open hole design, this intermediate flute is a great step up from beginner flutes.
pros: Four-post foot joint construction for strength
Unique embouchure hole design with proportioned tone holes
Pad cups ensure even response and extraordinary tone
Comes with case and cleaning rod
Gizmo key facilitates high C. Silver plated
cons: Some have difficulty adjusting to the open key design, but the hole plugs help the transition to this higher-level skill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect intermediate piece
customer_reviews.text: Love the tone I get on this instrument. A major factor in my decision to buy was the other reviews stating that this is a good intermediate instrument, such as for use in a pit orchestra. As flute is my second instrument, I'd have to agree. My main instrument, I've invested a lot more in. Nonetheless, if you're looking for a good instrument that won't break the bank, this piece comes in a gorgeous red velvety case and padded overcast, with a cleaning rod, Gemeinhardt warranty and care instructions, and an anti tarnish strip. Most importantly, the extra length facilitates high notes, you have the b footnote, the advanced open-holed style, the beautiful silver, and quality of a Gemeinhardt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... after much research I chose this flute and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: My previous flute was a closed hole student that was not the highest quality and after playing flute for 5 years I decided it was time for an upgrade and after much research I chose this flute and I'm glad I did. Its sound quality is amazing and the keys are really nice and it feels nice to play. It did take some getting used to because I was used to playing a closed hole flutebut it does come with key plugs which every week I just took one out and not I play with out them. But overall I love this flute so much and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent intermediate flute
customer_reviews.text: Love this flute! I had been playing a used Armstrong student flute for quite some time and wanted to step up a bit & after a lot of research, opted for the Gemeinhardt 30B. So far, so good--the tone, quality, finish, etc., are all great. I played alto sax in high school (eons ago) and had wanted, then, to double on flute, but never did. It's never too late.
customer_reviews.author: Pea Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Intermediate Flute. HIGHLY recommended
customer_reviews.text: This flute is perfect for an intermediate player. I bought this for my daughter's 4th year of playing flute. It's absolutely beautiful. The sound is amazing. The craftsmanship is fantastic. Her band director spoke very highly of it and was very happy that we purchased it. The music store nearby was trying to charge me three times more. There are plugs for the open holes. My daughter is slowly taking them out to get used to the open holes. You will definitely get your money's worth and will be very happy. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intermediate instrument
customer_reviews.text: So far extremely happy with the new flute!! Tone quality is amazing and we are slowly working on not using the plugs. My daughter needed a better flute now she’s on high school and I didn’t want to pay the enormous prices. This was a great compromise. Shipping was great after I contacted them since it had been a week but they responded right away and i received it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Nice Step-up Instrument
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves her new flute. Has a much better tone than her beginner flute and it seemed she played better immediately. It's an adjustment going to the open holes though, so she has had to resort to the included plugs on a couple of the holes.
customer_reviews.author: tech_check73

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for pit doublers
customer_reviews.text: This flute is a great instrument for pit orchestra woodwind doublers because it has professional features at a modest cost. These include open keys, a silver-plated headjoint, a gizmo key and a B-foot. Low B shows up in show music and the extra length facilitates very high notes. The price of this instrument allows the doubler to get a quality instrument at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: TubaMan

customer_reviews.title: This flute sounds great. I have never played an opened hole flute ...
customer_reviews.text: This flute sounds great. I have never played an opened hole flute before, so it's going to take a little time to get used to but I love it. Shipping was right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ash A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Relearning in my 60&s what i learned in grade school
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting over and had problems until I bought the open hole plugs. My hands are small and I couldn’t stretch far enough. After putting in the plugs i love it
customer_reviews.author: KCinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommmend
customer_reviews.text: The flute arrived in time, in excellent condition. I used to play on a beginner’s flute, and this was a substantial upgrade in terms of tone and the key mechanisms. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Demond M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, plays beautifully. I am completely satisfied. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I can say is this flute sounds amazing. It sounds strong and clear and took my ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flute for our daughter. Unfortunately, I am not an expert on instruments with knowledge of make, materials, specs and details so I cannot speak to those things. What I can say is this flute sounds amazing. It sounds strong and clear and took my breath away when played.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great instrument, good sound, my daughter loves it as an intermediate enthusiast
customer_reviews.author: GP BSN

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter made middle school top band with this
customer_reviews.text: It is not the best flute in the land but it is quite a step up from her previous $300 model. It has much better sound. Not as good as my other granddaughter's $2,000 pearl but a step up. She also went to band camp last week and made top band for final performance. I am sure a lot of it is her competitive nature and the fact she practices everyday but having a better instrument never hurts. In my opinion well worth the price. If she makes top band in high school she gets the pearl though and can use this one for marching.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly Flute
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect flute for a student or a hobbyist flautist seeking a budget friendly intermediate flute. I haven't played the flute in years and recently decided to get back into playing again, but wasn't looking at spending thousands of dollars on something that was only going to be for personal enjoyment. This flute for it's price is simply amazing, and I will enjoy it for years to come. Thanks Mike's Brass and Woodwind for the little goodies that came with the flute, very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Onetta123

customer_reviews.title: Delightful sound and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound. Wish it had come with instructions on how to care for flute
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Simon

customer_reviews.title: This flute has a beautiful sound and is easy to play
customer_reviews.text: This flute has a beautiful sound and is easy to play. I highly recommend it, especially at such a reasonable price for a quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Benelisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Great customer service, package arrived before scheduled time and granddaughter was quite surprised with her birthday gift. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: LaVonda S.

customer_reviews.title: The instrument sounds beautiful. After spending months of researching various brands and ...
customer_reviews.text: The flute was for my high school daughter. She uses the flute for marching band and concert band. And will continue to use for the next few years. The instrument sounds beautiful. After spending months of researching various brands and types of flutes this flute was more than worth the money. It looks and sounds sounds great. My daughter has quickly adapted to the open hole keys and the extra length and key. Her very own flute, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda maldonado

customer_reviews.title: New Geminhardt Flute
customer_reviews.text: Flute arrived as advertised and my daughter is extremely happy with her new Intermediate Flute. Price was very reasonable and much better than the local music stores. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: anonomous

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got and using it years now, very good product
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but wish the plugs were more effective and did not pop through so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jalaine Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty good. My daughter love it. It is good for her to keep it until colledge.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade from a beginner flute to high school intermediate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect upgrade to an intermediate instrument for my daughter. Comes with hole plugs for easy transition.Comes with a hard case inside a soft padded case with handles. Very nice tone and quiet key action.
customer_reviews.author: Riskybiz1964

customer_reviews.title: Great flute, junk case.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the flute but both the hard case and soft case that it comes with are JUNK. Can't imagine why Gemeinhardt would want to put their name on something that is such poor quality. It is basically just made out of cardboard. Fell apart in the first year. And Gemeinhardt did not respond to my request for replacement. Or even to let me know where I could get an actual flute case to fit this flute.
customer_reviews.author: KimE

customer_reviews.title: Good instrument.
customer_reviews.text: This was my move up flute. The first one was a cheap one and cost $115 which was perfect for introductory "try it out" flute. But now with this one the tone is fabulous, the keys work incredibly well, and it just feels right. Good instrument.
customer_reviews.author: WNC 57

customer_reviews.title: I am a small person so I wanted the offset keys and wanted a better model than the grade school flute I still have
customer_reviews.text: I haven't played the flute in over 45 years. I am a small person so I wanted the offset keys and wanted a better model than the grade school flute I still have. The sound on this one is very good, the price is right and I am having a blast playing it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: very good item
customer_reviews.text: It is real open hole flute. My daughter likes this instrument. It is little longer than regular flute but music is much louder and clearer. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vyacheslav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instrument is beautiful and sounds great! I would highly recommend dealing with this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Benavides

customer_reviews.title: For a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a beginner flute but not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Step Up..😎
customer_reviews.text: I think this instrument is one of the Best. Gemeinhardt, has a History of a fine product. I am pleased..😎😎
customer_reviews.author: Harold Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Instrument
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new Gemeinhardt flute. She will enjoy it for many years to come. Thank you very much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wallner

customer_reviews.title: An excellent Gemeinhardt Flute.
customer_reviews.text: What are grandpa's for then make sure up coming stars get the right Flute! My granddaughter was in ? were they evolved her ability to play, was rated very high with and old flute. I hope this will help her along. I can't say enough about how fast Rich Lupo and Piccolos was in their shipping. It was in time for her spring concert. Thank-you. I also liked their Warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing great. Found better flute cheaper with better tone at local music store.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This company is awesome. The flute is beautiful and plays with such a great tone. I have two other flutes and this one is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and Gemeinhardt was NO HELP.
customer_reviews.text: Within the 1st 9 months it had leaks. Gemeinhardt said that the manufacturer warranty would NOT cover that as they did NOT consider it a defect in the flute. Flute was used daily for a high school concert band class. Nothing excessive, and not exposed to elements. Very disappointed. What does their manufacturer warranty cover then???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making Beautiful Music Together
customer_reviews.text: I just love this flute and make no bones about it. Gemeinhardt is a well known and trusted name in flutes. This particular flute is an excellent intermediate one and comes at a reasonable cost. This instrument comes fully equipped with a lovely case and a cleaning rod. Be sure to take excellent care of it and you and it will be making beautiful music together.
customer_reviews.author: BeatleBangs1964

product_meta.title: Gemeinhardt Model 3OB Flute, Open Hole, Offset G, B-Foot, Silver Plated
product_meta.description: The Model 3 Flute features Gemeinhardt's exclusive four-post foot joint construction for especially strong flutes, as well as a unique embouchure hole design, proportioned tone holes, and pad cups to ensure even response and extraordinary tone throughout all registers. It also includes a case, and a cleaning rod.Tradition and TechnologyA fourth generation flutemaker, Kurt Gemeinhardt dedicated himself to creating remarkably responsive instruments with a beautiful tone which would distinguish them from all others. Today Gemeinhardt continues his legacy by crafting flutes that achieve a delicate balance between superb artistry and sophisticated technology for flutists of all talents and abilitiesDurably constructed of the finest materials, Gemeinhardt flutes feature integrally drawn and rolled tone holes, power-coined keys, and our exclusive four post footjoint construction which make our flutes exceptionally strong. Other features include Gemeinhardt's unique embouchure hole design, proportioned tone holes and pad cups to ensure even response and extraordinary tone throughout all registers. In addition, a Gizmo key (high C facilitator) is standard on every B foot model flute. Gemeinhardt flutes also feature superior key mechanisms for fast action and outstanding playability..
feature_bullets: Intermediate level, Open Hole, Offset G, B footjoint, Silver-Plated construction, French style keys.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
